name: Obei
description:
Obei is a puzzle game made for the GMTK jam 2020 withe the theme "Out of Control". You command the little robot Obei trying to reach the end of the level. But each of your inputs has limited supply.

Use WASD to control Obei and press R to restart a level.

Assets made with 4 colors during the gamejam.

Didn't have time left to make sound effects and music.

The song used is Four Years by Monplaisir.
